gameframe

Class AbstractGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gameframe.AbstractGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GUI, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public abstract class AbstractGUI
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements GUI, java.awt.event.MouseListener
    GUI class that functions as the Controller (MVC) in the Grid-Based Game Framework.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
